ygData.subject: Re: Jumping In
ygData.msgSnippet: Tails stood at the edge of the cliff, body erect. She sniffed the air cautiously. I smell fear, Gold. And pain. I feel like a sitting duck here, almost

From: Danielle Laing <sky_duv@...>

Tails stood at the edge of the cliff, body erect.
She sniffed the air cautiously.
"I smell fear, Gold. And pain. I feel like a sitting
duck here, almost waiting to get killed. I should help
heal the hurt and sick..."
She paused, and turned to the large eagle.
"I am a healer, not a fighter. But I..."
Tails hesitated, tucking her tail around her for
warmth.
"I am looking for someone. I'm not sure who it is,
though. I feel the yearning to go find somebody that I
once lost long ago.." The squirrel sighed restlessly,
and sat back on her haunches.
